Title: The Tagger
Writer: Daniel J. Goor (created by), Michael Schur (created by), Norm Hiscock, Lesley Arfin (executive story editor), Gil Ozeri (executive story editor)
Actors: Andy Samberg, Stephanie Beatriz, Terry Crews, Melissa Fumero
Plot: When Jake arrives late for work, Captain Holt decides to shadow him. However, the arrest they make proves complicated. Meanwhile, a psychic friend of Gina's gets inside Charles' head.
